{{Quote|Report to One-Eyed Joe in the stables.|[[Maester Aemon]] to [[Luke]]|You Win or You Die}} 
'''Joe''', nicknamed '''One-Eyed Joe''', is an unseen character in ''[[Game of Thrones (TV series)|Game of Thrones]]''. He is a member of the [[Night's Watch]], and apparently chief among the stewards stationed in the stables at [[Castle Black]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there's no member of the Night's Watch called One-Eyed Joe.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
When the newly graduated recruits are assigned to their orders [[Luke]] is told by [[Maester Aemon]] to report to One-Eyed Joe in the stables.<ref>"[[You Win or You Die]]"</ref>
